user_story: As a user, I want to add items to my cart so that I can purchase them later.
test_case:
Feature: Add to Cart
Scenario: Successfully adding an item to the cart
Given the user is on the product page
When the user clicks 'Add to Cart'
Then the item should be added to the cart

user_story: As a user, I want to track my order so that I can know the delivery status.
test_case:
Feature: Order Tracking
Scenario: Viewing order status
Given the user is on the order history page
When the user clicks on an order
Then the system should display the current status of the order

user_story: As an admin, I want to update product prices so that I can reflect market changes.
test_case:
Feature: Update Product Price
Scenario: Successfully updating product prices
Given the admin is logged into the dashboard
When the admin modifies the price of a product
Then the updated price should reflect on the product page

user_story: As a bank customer, I want to transfer money to another account so that I can pay my bills.
test_case:
Feature: Bank Transfer
Scenario: Successful money transfer
Given the user is on the bank's transfer page
When the user enters recipient details and confirms transfer
Then the money should be deducted from the account and credited to the recipient

user_story: As a user, I want to check my loan eligibility so that I can apply for a loan.
test_case:
Feature: Loan Eligibility Check
Scenario: Checking loan eligibility
Given the user is logged into the banking portal
When the user navigates to the 'Loan Eligibility' section and enters details
Then the system should display whether the user is eligible for a loan

user_story: As a user, I want to filter products by price so that I can find items within my budget.
test_case:
Feature: Product Filtering
Scenario: Filtering by price
Given the user is on the product listing page
When the user selects a price range
Then the system should only display products within that range

user_story: As a user, I want to receive payment notifications so that I can track my transactions.
test_case:
Feature: Payment Notifications
Scenario: Receiving a notification for a transaction
Given the user has enabled notifications
When a transaction is processed
Then the user should receive an email and SMS notification

user_story: As a merchant, I want to view my sales analytics so that I can understand my business performance.
test_case:
Feature: Sales Analytics
Scenario: Viewing sales data
Given the merchant is logged into the dashboard
When the merchant navigates to the 'Analytics' section
Then the system should display sales trends and revenue details
